book_title: Nap Time: The True Story of Sexual Abuse at a Suburban Day Care Center

Offers an account of the sexual abuse of fifty-one preschoolers at the

Summary:
When her sister Phoebe summoned her to Grayson Hall a fortnight before

intrigued. it seemed a ghost was stalking the corridors of this

A fiery tale of love and ecstasy that follows the adventures of a

Intent on exposing her father's killer--a man known to travel in
the highest circles of London society--Chandra has to enter a marriage
of convenience to trap the villain.

Dr. Rachel Noyes expects some resistance to a lady doctor when she
arrives in the rough-and-ready Kansas frontier town of Stone Creek,
but the sparks really start to fly when she encounters the town's
handsome, brawny Sheriff Seth Wellesley

A sheltered Southern belle finds fiery, forbidden ecstasy in the
burning embrace of the bronzed, virile halfbreed whose grandparents
own a neighboring plantation

book_title: Michael Landon : His Triumph and Tragedy
Summary:
Explores the life of the popular actor, from his unhappy childhood to
his death from cancer

Rachel and Zalman Isakharov, a sister and brother in a divided family,
find success in the business world and find love through two World
Wars, the Great Depression, and the Vietnam War. Reprint.

book_title: Lie and Say You Love Me
Summary:
Amid the charity balls, Southampton parties, and Broadway opening
nights, four representatives of old and new money--gifted actress
Angela Holden, aging beauty Layne Fielding-Blair, director Alan
Eichorn, and producer Jack Goddard--lock ...

Beautiful Carson Mueller is determined to hold onto her inheritance,
despite the fact that muscular gun-toting Kohl Baron claims that he
won it from her uncle during a poker game. Original.

In East Africa on a government mission, hunter Cray Branson finds his
job complicated by the animal-like presence of Reba Von Hausen, a
beautiful woman who has lived in the wilds for years. Original.

Determined to put a stop to the charlatan who has been conning wealthy
New York matrons, New York City Detective Stephen Hawke begins his
investigation and falls for Lauren Stanton, the British-born companion
of one of the con man's victims ...

Roberta Paxton's worst premonitions may be realized as a killer
with a perverse desire to kidnap two sisters--killing one and loving
the other--stalks her and her sister Tobie. Original.

Hiring a handsome drifter to help her run her Arizona ranch, Pamela
White soon learns of his legendary skill with a gun and with a
lady's heart. Original.

Busy guarding her family's vast ranch from scheming landgrabbers,
strong-willed Leah Harding is ill-prepared when Calhoun Stevens, a
ruggedly handsome gunslinger, shows up with an unproven claim on her
family land. Original.

Saved from a fiery death by handsome Storm Dancer, Lady Rachael
Moreover feels she must give herself willingly to this rugged, untamed
man who saved her life. Original.

Samantha Lowery finds her plans to protect her family farm from ex-
rebel marauders put on hold when she decides to nurse Jake Morgan, a
wounded Confederate doctor, back to health. Original.

By day a surgeon, by night the Union's secret weapon, the Falcon,
Union Captain Justin Pearce tempts the loyalty of Confederate spy
Adriane Valcour, a woman who would do anything to save the
Confederacy. Original.

After his vampire brother Simon betrays him, leaving him for dead to
pursue a human love, Franz Drake the Bloodmaster vows to turn the
Florida beaches into his eternal kingdom of darkness and to teach him
the true meaning of passion.

Maverick marine engineer Dan Brande and his multinational team of
experts must use state-of-the-art robotic submersibles to rescue a
downed Soviet missile carrying a dangerous nuclear reactor. Original.

When he hires shy, bookish Sarah as his summer research assistant,
Professor David Wakely is ill-prepared for the disasters that seem to
follow the wealthy woman around wherever she goes. Original.

Attending a Halloween party dressed in the identical costume as her
best friend, Kelly, Piper Jordan is horrified when Kelly is murdered
and even more shocked when she realizes the killer had intended to
murder Piper. Original.

En route across the Western plains, a beautiful, silver-haired scout
and the rugged leader of a wagon train find love and passion in each
other's arms. Original.
Death holds no secrets for Miami Homicide Detective Rick Barrish.

Miranda Drummond is horrified when the commanding officer who had sent
her father off into the battle that ended his life returns from the
war to marry her grieving mother, and she flees home, joining a
theater troupe. Original.

Abducted from her own casino by a troublemaking gambler who had
kidnapped her only to protect her from his pursuers, Lorelei Latham is
determined to see him pay for his crime, even as she falls for his
charms. Original.

Finally old enough to rescue her brother--abducted by Comanches years
before and raised as one of their own--Serena Graves must rely on Peco
Smith to lead her to her brother and help her negotiate the rescue.
Original.

Overprotected William begins to notice that the children in his town
never seem to grow up, no matter how many birthday parties they have,
and discovers that the town's well-meaning parents have devised a
plan to keep their children young ...

When the man she loves, handsome Captain Everard, announces his plans
to marry her less-than-intelligent sister, Julia, Diana is determined
to show Everard that he has chosen the wrong woman. Original.

Determined to put her life back together after her divorce, Sara
Henderson begins attending night classes at the university, but
getting there means crossing the fog-enshrouded Balboa Park, where a
vicious killer is reportedly stalking ...

Four generations of bayou women, submersed in a sweltering culture of
jazz, sugar cane, voodoo, and plantations, carry on the lasting
traditions of the Deep South in ways characteristic of their distinct
personalities

Determined to prove herself as capable as the next man, Darcey
O'Rourke travels west to stop the robberies that are plaguing her
father's stagecoach business and falls for Kane Callahan, the man
assigned to protect her. Original.

The ultimate biological weapon lies in the hands of a Ninja warrior
with a mad dream of reestablishing Japan as the world's mightiest
military superpower.

Recognizing Mary Michael Dennehy as the big city reporter he met once
before, Ethan Stone--one of a gang of train robbers that has taken
over Mary's train to Colorado--kidnaps her before his comrades can
discover her identity

Vowing to nurse back to health the handsome scoundrel who saved her
life and then proceed to England alone, Jillian St. Erney finds that
ridding herself of her grateful patient will prove to be more
difficult than she hoped. Original.

Sworn to bring outlaw Ace Denton to justice for her father's
death, Jenny Templeton discovers that her determination to have
justice done is no match for her desire to love the handsome Ace.
Original.

As soon as she sets her eyes on Red Hawk, the proud native American
delegate attending the celebration of President Jackson's recent
election, Kit Newcomb knows that he is the man for her. Original.

Beautiful Constance Merriweather journeys to Mexico to find ancient
Aztec gold, but the fiery kisses of a fellow archaeologist reveal a
hidden treasure more exquisite than anything she had ever imagined

Known to her neighbors as the Black Widow, twenty-one-year-old Rachel
Fleming Barlow Newman McCandless has buried three husbands but finds
yet more grief when she becomes involved in her last husband's
nefarious doings. Reprint.

With a madman on the loose in the streets of Victorian London,
Jessamyn Forsythe risks her life to find her missing sister,
disguising herself as a simple working girl and falling into the hands
of Inspector Devlin Burke. Original.

Determined to save the innocent gringo, accused of robbing her
father's trains, from the hangman's noose, Mexican beauty
Aurelia Mazon helps the handsome man escape and then joins him on the
lam. Original.

After expelling the neo-Nazi armies from the lands east of the
Rockies, the United American forces, led by fighter pilot Hawk Hunter,
must free the war-blackened West Coast, still under the rule of the
enemy. Original.

A collection of three tales of love and marriage features "Apache
Caress," in which Arizona beauty Belle Cassidy must choose
between her cousin and a handsome Apache, "Mail Order
Maiden," and "A Captive Bride." Original.

Posing as a sharp-tongued shrew to save herself from an unhappy
marriage, Lady Psyche Veringham expends her energy on finding a match
for her ward, Amanda, but the chosen mate, the Earl of Southdon, has
other plans. Original.

Bonded by an act of vengeance and sworn to secrecy, Kate, Shelly,
Valerie, and Barbara reunite twenty years later to reevaluate the
sacrifices made on their way to success

With dreams of seeking revenge for the murder of his father, Luke
McQuade travels to Kansas on the trail of his prey and meets Valeria
Walters, a tempting beauty who soon makes him question the reasons
behind his dark mission

While trying to keep her family's mercantile business afloat,
Leona Stegall finds herself in the wrong place at the wrong time and
becomes the human shield, and captive, of Dr. Lathe Caldwell, a man on
a mission of revenge. Original.

Certain that with Lord Southam's protection she could have access
to London's highest circles and would be able to locate her long-
lost father, Janine Beaumont uses her beauty to capture the unwitting
lord. Original.

Seeking shelter from the snow storm, Dean Knight and his family take
refuge in the Neva Monastery, whose inhabitants, they soon discover,
thrive on twisted forms of worship and bloody rituals. Original.

A routine debriefing assignment for field operative Brent Graves turns
into an international maze of deception and murder when a Soviet
defector reveals sensitive information that could topple entire
nations. Reprint.

Determined to bear a child of her own, Dorothy Kite makes a pact with
the devil, and soon the forces of evil are hovering over New York,
waiting for their new arrival and their coming reign of terror.
Original.
A modern epic novel about the search for truth in a world gone mad.

With half of her family's country inn under the ownership of
Wilder Burlington, Bethany Howard must work hard to keep the business
afloat and steer clear of the passionate kisses of this handsome
stranger. Original.

Texas heiress Laura Leigh Webster thought she was prepared for the
perils she might face on her first African safari.

book_title: Contract on America: The Mafia Murder of President John F. Kennedy
Summary:
Author David E. Scheim offers indisputable evidence of a chilling
underworld scheme to control the government of the United States of
America through fear, extortion, and cold-blooded murder... a
terrifying conspiracy that didn't end on a ...

book_title: Love's Own Reward (Lucky in Love Series, No. 3)
Summary:
Turning her back on the world when the media frenzy over her act of
heroism begins to drive her crazy, Charley Carter becomes the target
of Jess McMaster, an undercover reporter determined to get a story on
her. Original.

Left nearly penniless after her husband's death, Cassandra
Morrison leases her garage to Jack Cumberland, a millionaire posing as
a poor woodcarver. Original.

Raised by the Barbary pirates who kidnapped him as a boy, Lord
Alexander Wakefield thinks of women as objects to possess, until he
meets Victoria Lynn Lawrence, the British heiress he has abducted.
Original.

Ten years after he fell in love with Floryn, the golden-eyed beauty
stuck in a passionless marriage with his uncle, Cord Donaldson leaves
prison to discover that Floryn has not forgotten their time together.
Original.

Determined to salvage the valuable treasures lying beneath the
Caribbean, Kathleen Montgomery finds her plans thwarted by handsome
sea captain Jonas Irons, who has come in search of his long-lost
brother. Original.

Determined to keep her family's riverboat business afloat,
Columbia Baranoff is enraged when her father's greatest competitor
hires handsome Nash Foster to ship some of the cargo meant for the
Baranoff's boat. Original.

Born half-vampire, Danielle Walthers finds her vampire lust rising
when she moves to Beverly Hills, and soon she is compelled to prowl
the streets of Los Angeles in search of blood. Original.

Returning to Ravensfall to exorcise old ghosts, Malvina Raven arrives
to find her cousins, Clinton and Lucy, and Devlin Fordyke, a handsome,
brooding American, and is certain that they are conspiring against
her. Original.

Confined to her castle by her late husband's corrupt advisors,
Princess Jade Crosse finds solace in the arms of Sir Lyon Beauchane,
the man who had entered her chamber window to confront the woman he
believes to be a tyrannical ruler.

Forced by poverty to seek a marriage to a Minnesota farmer, mail-order
bride Kirsten Lundgren arrives to find that the homely farmer she
expected to find is actually a handsome seducer. Original.

Certain that she will die on the desolate Dakota prairie after native
Americans attack her wagon train, Carolina finds herself miraculously
rescued by Drake McNeil, a handsome stranger

Widowed on her wedding day, Kimimilia, a native American woman, swears
to bring to justice the bluecoats who killed her husband, but
reluctantly falls for one of them--a Union soldier captured by her
tribe. Original.

About to become the latest victim of Park Song, a sick crime lord with
a lust for beautiful women, Tawny DaSilva must rely on the help of New
York Police Detective Manny Decker to escape from her captor. Reprint.

Back home after three years at an exclusive finishing school in the
East, headstrong Texas belle Bianca Moreno puts aside thoughts of
marriage to a wealthy rancher when she meets Rick Larkin, a handsome
ranchhand. Original.

Prepared for almost any peril in the New World, spirited Miranda
Chadwick is shocked when she falls under the sway of Jack Blackstone,
a roguish pirate intent on taking what he can from Miranda and then
leaving her high and dry. Original.

Recognizing her sheriff father's most recent prisoner as the
Apache brave who rescued her from captivity when she was fourteen,
Aissa Gerard defies her father's orders and visits the prisoner
under cover of the night. Original.

Years after their disappearance, the children taken from their small
town by an unknown being return to their families, unaged and wearing
the same clothes they wore when they disappeared. Original.

More comfortable in the company of little girls than of women his own
age, a shadowy psychopath befriends Carrie Sutton's teenaged
daughter soon after she and her mother move into his neighborhood.
Original.

Accustomed to peer ridicule for his and his mother's pale
complexion and dark clothing, teenaged Adragon is stunned when he
attends a meeting with his mother and discovers that he and she are
vampires. Original.

When the publicity-seeking antics of a budding Hollywood starlet known
as the Dream Walker tarnish the usually spotless reputation of a
family friend, Manhattan acting teacher Olivia Hudson decides to beat
the actress at her own game.

book_title: The Haunted Heiress of Wyndcliffe Manor
Summary:
Orphaned as a child, Jane flees the coal-mining town of her adopted
family and finds her way to Wycliffe Manor, her birthright, where,
determined to avenge her grandfather's murder and claim her
inheritance, she faces danger and deceit.

Asked to accompany her beloved uncle's heir, Jean Hilliard,
throughout the London season, Camilla Rayburn agrees, but finds
herself strangely attracted to the rough-mannered Canadian who cares
nothing for London society. Original.

While helping her architect uncle construct his dream design, sensible
country girl Felicia falls for Major Adam Temple, the head builder,
and becomes the object of lust for the wealthy aristocrat who ordered
the construction. Original.

Arriving in Jennings, Louisiana, to begin her practice, lady doctor
Wynn Spencer finds the locals wary of a female physician, especially
Michael Donovan, the devilishly handsome cowboy who runs the town.
Original.

Years after she takes in and nurses back to health British spy Jason
McClenna, who was wounded while on a mission for Wellington, Parisian
resident Genna is reunited with her lover in the Creole world of New
Orleans. Original.

Sisters yet strangers, Alexa and Catherine each has always yearned for
the sister she never really had, and never knowing how to reach out to
each other.

After killing her husband in self-defense, Thomasina Waxton flees her
home, takes the name of Ellen Scarlet, and builds a new life for
herself on the London stage. Original.

In the town of Red Light to settle the estate of his late sister,
Smoke Jensen discovers that Major Cosgrove has taken over the town and
intends to mine the gold beneath Jensen's sister's lands.
Original.

Emerging from their Arctic prison fifty years into the future, the
crew of the super-carrier Yonanga discovers that the forces of the
Middle East have complete control of the world. Original.

Caught between her two worlds, half-vampire Danielle Walthers wages a
war against the vampire cabal that lurks beneath the world of show
business and is branded a Wilding--a vampire that kills its own kind.
Original.

Years after a serial killer murdered Detective Cotter's wife and
children, Cotter rebuilds his life, with the help of Cindy, but
another series of murders soon leads him to believe that the killer is
back. Original.

Nursed back to health by the Boston-bred Cassie Layton, who has come
to Santa Fe to start a new life, government agent Cruz Delgado
realizes that to reveal his true identity could put his newfound lover
in danger. Original.

Left penniless and alone by the Civil War, Cameron Forrester agrees to
marry Angelina O'Brien, but forgets his plans to use her
father's payment to avenge his parents' killer when he sets
eyes on his bride-to-be. Original.

Left depressed, grief-stricken, and without a career after the death
of the mother she had spent her life nursing, Jessica Meyers gets a
second chance at life when two guardian angels come her way. Original.

But professional ethics prevent Gregory from revealing the
"privileged information" that will clear his name and
perhaps save his life-since the killer responsible for these deaths
may be one of his patients.

Notorious for her lovemaking and her robberies, outlaw Colorado Kate
knows her luck has run out when infamous gunslinger Jake Lassiter
crosses her path. Original.

Determined to rebuild the town of Renford--which was sacked by his
fellow Normans--and gain the Saxons' trust, Rolf de Valmont must
begin with their leader, Merlyn. Original.
From the author of D'Affaire.

Alone and injured in a lifeboat after a shipwreck, Caroline Rowe is
saved and brought to a tropical island, where she must learn to love
her rescuer, Luke Garston, who has lived away from civilization for
years. Original.

Ordered to shut down drug lord Lon Pot's multibillion-dollar
heroin empire, hidden in a remote northern province of Burma, CIA
Deputy Director Ben Wilcox uses Alpha Kat, the sleakest, high-tech
stealth air fighter ever designed. Original.

Divorced after nearly forty years of marriage, Carolyn Ames finds
herself attracted to a handsome architect, but is uncertain whether
she is ready to give up her independence once again

Still smarting from her husband's marital infidelities, Dana
Morgan sets up house in Port Alicia, a fishing village on the Gulf
coast and becomes involved in a chilling conspiracy involving sabotage
and violence. Original.

A doctor searches into the past of a beautiful hospitalized girl to
discover her true identity

Determined to pay off her family's debt and serve her country,
Delilah Trowbridge takes a job in the home of British merchant Nathan
Trent, where she spies for the colonies and attracts Nathan's
attention. Original.

Eleven years after southern charmer Brad Hampton stole her virginity
during a night of passion, Kathlyn McKinney must fend off the forceful
rogue once again when he returns to town. Original.

A collection of six tales of Yuletide romance features work by
Georgina Devon, Violet Hamilton, Valerie King, Mary Kingsley, Meg-Lynn
Roberts, and Olivia Summer. Original.

Forced by her obsession for vegeance, Miranda brings about the death
of her father's murderer, and she and Shreve must flee an
implacable enemy, from New Orleans to the backstreets of Mexico City.
Original.

book_title: The Kirtland Massacre: The True and Terrible Story of the Mormon Cult Murders
Summary:
An account of the crimes of Jeffrey Lundgren and his family describes
how Lundgren lured followers from the established Latter Day Saints
and indoctrinated them into a religious cult practicing violence,
sexual humiliation, and murder.

Though well-loved by the village children to whom she tells stories,
woodcutter's daughter Juel Reynaude saves her own heart for Baron
Orion Sutherland, a high-born man who barely knows she is alive.
Original.

Desperate to escape the scandal of her divorce London-born Charlotte
Drake flees to the Las Vegas Territory, where she enters into a
business arrangement with gambler Max Grant. Original.

The only doctor in the dusty town of Glory, Nevada, Nora Bowen becomes
enraged and intrigued by Jake Brackston, a male chauvinist with
definite ideas about a woman's place in the world. Original.

In need of funds, bounty hunter Bliss Harrison jumps at the chance to
track down Travis La Mont, an outlaw with a bounty of two hundred
dollars, but Travis's seductive character could make Bliss give up
the job altogether. Original.

Willing to help any man in need, regardless of the color of his
uniform, Civil War volunteer Callie Angel falls for half-breed Union
Captian Rafe Santino, who seems unwilling to trust Callie with his
wounded prisoner. Original.

Recently widowed, mother of three Laura finally discovers what it
means to put herself first, and she begins a relationship with Steve,
her high school sweetheart. Original. (Romance).

Talented and ambitious, clothing designer Char Brody finds her drive
to be the best in the world of international haute couture faltering
when she meets handsome photojournalist Fletcher Hawkins. Original.

Stone, the author of Happy Endings, Rainbows and Pearl Moon creates a
memorable cast of characters--women and men whose lives intertwin in
friendship and love, joy and tragedy, impossible dreams and
heartbreaking betrayal.

book_title: Vice Cop: My Twenty-Year Battle With New York's Dark Side
Summary:
Bill McCarthy, a veteran New York City cop, tells how he went
undercover to expose New York City's darkest crimes, both on the
street and in the precinct

Private eye Shawn Madden begins to suspect that Karissa Caine--a
wealthy woman under cover to investigate her father's murder--is
not the provincial barmaid she claims to be. Original.

Katy Halliday, a native New Yorker, wants to write a novel about the
West, so she visits family friends in Dodge City and has personal
encounters with Bat Masterson and Wyatt Earp

Divorced for years and thoroughly enjoying her job with a large
insurance company, fifty-something Marian travels to Mississippi to
assess property damage after a storm and meets Don Worth, a handsome
widower. Original. (Romance).

Gina, a seductive teenaged girl, lures her thirty-two-year-old high-
school teacher, Phil, into a nightmare, and soon a series of
atrocities begin to unfold in her sleepy, California desert town.
Original.

book_title: The Dark Secrets of Greystone Manor
Summary:
Raised within the ancient crumbling walls of Greystone Manor,
motherless Victoria Garth is horrified when her beloved stepbrother,
Adam, brings his strange, new bride back to live there. Original.

book_title: A Love for All Time (Zebra Books)
Summary:
Endless passion and the romance of a lifetime fill this enchanting
time travel Heartfire by the author of Rosefire.

A steamy medieval romance from the author of Passion's Deep Spell,
Wicked, Wild Eden, and Midnight Flame. believes killed her husband,
Amberlie de Fontaine unwittingly finds herself surrendering to the
sweet ecstacy of his tempetuous ...

A beautiful young widow is comforted by her dead husband's best
friend--a half-Shawnee warrior--and rediscovers love in his forbidden
embrace. Original.

A New York woman, eager for an adventure, finds a job on a ranch in
Australia and a handsome rancher who fills her heart with love.
Original.

A collection of Valentine's Day romance stories features the tale
of a renewed marriage proposal, the arrival of several unsigned
Valentine's cards, and a ghost writer of Valentine's verses
who falls in love with a customer. Original.

Saddled with high-powered corporate responsibilities after she
inherits the family business, free-wheeling Tori Rouchard falls for
business magnate Rand Jardaine, the man attempting to buy out her
company. Original.

En route to California on an assignment from the U.S. Army, Texan
Lieutenant Clay Youngblood meets up with Nina Juarez, a beautiful
Mexican horse trader in trouble with the law and on the run

Because of her resemblance to the lady bandit he has been tailing for
some time, Marshal Lawton Stone is reluctant about escorting a young
woman back to Oklahoma to protect her father's land claim.
Original.

After purchasing the slave, Lucas, to keep him from fighting in
Rome's gladiator arena, Mira finds herself falling in love with
this man who was once a proud warrior in his native land. Original.

Norah Denby, a con woman targeting rich, unsuspecting gentleman, has
trouble keeping her usual poker face when she meets rugged Rory
Prescott. Original.

Tabor, a seasoned Viking conqueror who had yet to find a love match,
finally falls hard when he catches sight of beautiful Tanaka, an
Egyptian woman stolen from the banks of the Nile, on the slaver's
auction block. Original.

Thirty-five years after their initial attraction in a high-school
science class, Bud and Jessie meet, but Bud's unhappy marriage and
divorce has left him wary of women, and Jessie enjoys the freedom her
divorce has given her.

Beaten down by four years of war and the defeat of his beloved
Confederacy, the suicidal Trey Marsh rides toward Santa Fe, New
Mexico, looking for trouble--and finding it. Original.

An army of Nazis led by the maniacal Jesus Dieguez Mendoza Hoffman is
marching through South America toward the vulnerable heartland of
America.

Newly sprung form a South Dakota Correctional Facility, Anishabe
princess Angela Biwaban throws her parole officer off her scent by
accepting a new mission--to find the men who killed her best
friend's husband. Original.

The only surviving member of the Caine clan, a family of outlaws, bank
robbers, and horse thieves, Charity Caine is determined to settle down
among civilized folk, a dream that lawman Jake Turlow may make
impossible. Original.

Vowing to possess bewitching socialite Elisabeth Kendall, renowned
actor Marco Giovinco finds stiff resistance in Elisabeth's stuffy
parents, who would never allow their daughter to pursue a life on the
road. Original.

Returning home to Scotland, Meg MacLinn is horrified to discover that
her family's castle is occupied by none other than Ransom St.
Clair, a hated Englishman and the most arrogant man she has ever met.
Original.

book_title: That Certain Style (Lucky in Love No. 23)
Summary:
Suddenly wealthy after inheriting the bulk of her designer aunt
Patricia Rossiter's estate, Nina Swope gets sound advice from Ben
Wharton, the executor of the Rossiter estate and a man who does not
like what money has done to Nina.

While attending the marriage of the Spanish Infanta to the Duke of
Montpesier, sheltered Michelle Minoux meets a dark and mysterious
gypsy guitar player, who involves her in peril and intrigue. Original.

When his father dies soon after snooping into the activities around a
U.S. nuclear storage site, Luke Cameron scrambles to stop an army of
terrorists from striking the world's most powerful nations from
the inside. Reprint.

Chin Ah Kin, a Chinese man laboring in a railway workers' camp in
the Washington territory of 1873, leaves his work to accompany Sarah
Canary, a mysterious young woman, back to her home. Reprint.

Leaving her Indian suitor behind, Gillian Browne sails to Ireland to
build a life with a sea captain, but she is soon widowed and longs to
return to her Arizona home. Original.

Heartbroken when the man she was to marry breaks their engagement,
Susannah Butler is nonetheless outraged when another man, Terry
Armstrong, offers to marry her to protect her honor. Original.

As Gil Beach, a detective with the New York City police department,
pieces together clues to the identity of a child killer, memories of
his own childhood begin to resurface. Original.

book_title: The Duke's Easter Lady (Zebra Holiday Regency Romance)
Summary:
Lady Emma Winslow looks for a place to live but finds love instead
when she accepts an invitation to stay with the Duke of Attleberg
during her search for lodgings. Original.

Ms. Laden displays a wonderful touch with her fiery lovers that
guarantees success in an extremely competitive genre.--Rave Reviews.
Laden is the author of Scottish Rose. Original Regency Romance.

An accidental meeting by the river's edge propels Alexandra
Merritt, a lady who has fled to a small Canada town, and Morgan
Glendower, who has sought refuge from the horrors of war in the same
town, towards new love. Original.

book_title: Strings of Fortune (Lucky in Love, No 25)
Summary:
Made financially independent after the sale of her family heirlooms,
Elizabeth Mason is finally free to pursue her goals, and a handsome
businessman, but she soons discovers that she might also have to make
great sacrifices

book_title: Over Here, over There: The Andrews Sisters and the Uso Stars in World War II (Zebra Books)
Summary:
Examines the efforts of the Andrews Sisters and other USO performers
to entertain servicemen during World War II

Home again after being captured by native Americans, Aissa Gerard must
face the prejudices of her white neighbors as she and her Indian lover
build a life together. Original.

Desperate to escape her brutal brother-in-law, Angel Windsor flees
Philadelphia with her nephew and hires a handsome but dangerous half-
Indian protector in New Orleans to guide her to California. By the
author of Rapture's Rage. Original.

book_title: Edges of the Earth/a Man, a Woman, a Child in the Alaskan Wilderness
Summary:
Chronicles the adventures of a Chicago-born, Harvard-educated man who
left civilization behind to forge a new life in the Alaskan wilderness
with his family. Reprint.

Jilted by her fiance+a7, English Lady Alexandra Lambert flees to
America, where she is captured by renegade Indians and then rescued by
a nobleman who has also fled England to escape an arranged marriage.

Seduced by the very sight of a dangerous man named "The
Unicorn," convent-bred Desiree Dufour is willing to break her
vows to enter the convent just to experience passion with this
enigmatic stranger. By the author of Sea Dream. Original.

Pinkerton agent Matt Riordan is willing to risk everything, even his
life, to track down the legendary half-Indian woman who reportedly
lives in the wilderness. By the Mountain Ecstasy. Original.

book_title: Don't Take Away the Light (Zebra Books)
Summary:
Nine-year-old Teddy is puzzled by the strange music he hears coming
from the backyard, an he is willing to risk the wrath of his
overprotective "Dear" to discover what it is. By the author
of The Monastery. Original.

A military adventure concocted by ex-Soviets who call themselves the
"New World Order" threatens world peace as the rebels hijack
a high-tech U.S. warplane and a Russian space station. By the author
of Cold Front. Original.

A voluptuous two-hundred-year-old vampire chronicles her evolution

scorpions—hot guys, a cursed bracelet, and ancient tombs make it the
adventure of a lifetime.

Follows January James as she spends a month in Egypt working as a
conservator in the Tomb of Tekhen and Tekhnet with an obnoxious girl
named Chloe, scorpions, a cursed bracelet, and a gorgeous, and quite
possibly evil, guy named Seth.

In ancient Alexandria, Princess Roxanne must place her faith in
destiny when she awakens to a life she cannot remember. The only thing
she can be sure of is the mysterious man at her side who seduces her
with his sensual mastery. Original.

has a crush on Blue's older brother, Theo, who has a reputation
for being a jerk.

of classes at Skyville High School, and finds it difficult to blend in
with her new classmates when her super powers suddenly decide to
emerge in full force.

Disappointed and abandoned by all of the men she has ever known,
Charlotte Dalton vows to make a better life for herself--by herself--
in the fertile Sacramento Valley. And then she meets Luke Ashcroft.
Original.

Honor Gannon traveled to Texas to finally confront her distant father,
but when she crosses paths with a dark, compelling stranger, her
damaged heart begins its slow recovery in spite of her troubled past.

When a young widow and her two children take shelter from smallpox in

never had?

When her son is accused of murder, a prosecutor must race against time
